price: Yeroo Gooftaan isaa laga qulqulleffamaa "Xuwaa" jedhamu keessatti isatti lallabe.
arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: idh nādāhu rabbuhu bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
